name: Nika Katsitadze
story:
Hi, I’m a Frontend-focused full-stack developer. 
 While I focus on frontend development, I also contribute to the backend for full coverage. 
 I prioritize creating smooth, accessible, and visually appealing interfaces. 
 My work includes building pixel-perfect, flexible UIs, optimizing and improving development workflows. 
 If you need a developer who builds reliable solutions that elevate your product, let’s connect!
